result.execSummary:
The defendant Cornelius Antoine Green was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Manufacture/Deliver Heroin (<3g), a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(d)1.
  • Possess w/Intent-Heroin(>3-10g), a class E felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(d)2.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: AS TO EACH COUNT:  Pay costs, surcharges, assessments, supervision, DNA fees up to 10% of prison funds.  Failure to pay shall result in a civil judgment with tax intercept.
Concurrent with: AS TO COUNTS ONE AND TWO:  To run concurrent to any other sentence and as to each count.

superMiscConds.notes: No new law violations reaching the level of probable cause finding.
AODA assessment and treatment.  Absolute sobriety.  Random urine screens.

supervisions.notes:
Must provide a DNA sample in the State crime lab if you have not prevously done so. DNA sample 973.046 & 973.047.
As a convicted felon defendant shall never be in possession of any firearms at anytime in the future.  941.29 Wis. stats makes it another felony for anyone who has been convicted of a felony to ever possess a firearm, carrying with it it's own 10 year period of imprisonment or $25,000.00 fine or both.  Possess weapons as a convicted felon 973.176(1).
Defendant cannot vote in any election until civil rights are restored 973.176(2).
Concurrent with: AS STATED IN COUNT ONE.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Cornelius Antoine Green

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Cornelius Antoine Green in court with attorney Mark S Rosen.  Defendant Cornelius Antoine Green in custody.  Laura A. Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Statements made as to Sentencing by both counsel and Defendant.

AS TO COUNTS 1 and 2:    COURT SENTENCED Defendant to a MAXIMUM TERM OF IMPRISONMENT of 8 YEARS, to run concurrent to any other sentence, and as to each count, with credit for 0 days time served; the INITIAL TERM OF CONFINEMENT in the Wisconsin State Prison System is 4 YEARS; the MAXIMUM TERM OF EXTENDED SUPERVISION is 4 YEARS.  

Defendant IS NOT eligible for the Challenge Incarceration OR the Wisconsin Substance Abuse Programs.

COURT ORDERED THE FOLLOWING CONDITIONS AS TO THE EXTENDED SUPERVISION:
*  No new law violations reaching the level of a probable cause finding.
*  Pay costs, surcharges, assessments, supervision, DNA fees up to 10% of prison funds. Failure to pay shall result in a Civil Judgment with tax intercept.
*  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
*  AODA assessment and treatment.
*  Random urine screens.
*  MUST provide a DNA sample to the State Crime Lab, if you have not previously done so. DNA Sample 973.046 & 973.047.
*  As a convicted felon Defendant shall NEVER be in possession of any firearms at any time in the future  - 941.29 Wis. Stats makes it another felony for anyone who has been convicted of a felony to ever possess a firearm, carrying with it its own 10 year period of imprisonment or $25,000 fine or both. Possess Weapons as a Convicted Felon - 973.176(1).
*  Defendant cannot vote in any election until your civil rights are restored - 973.176(2).

Court ordered all copied emails to be sealed PER ORDER OF THE COURT.

Received and filed with court:
*  Written Explanation of Determinate Sentence Form
*  Ineligible Voting Notice and Acknowledgement Form
*  Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief Form

Defendant Cornelius Antoine Green in court with attorney Mark S Rosen.  Defendant Cornelius Antoine Green in custody.  Patricia I Daugherty for Laura Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds

Defendant waives constitutional rights, enters a plea of GUILTY to Counts 1 & 2 and is examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum  received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the Complaint as a factual basis for judgment.  Court finds defendant guilty of Counts 1 & 2 as charged in the Information and enters a judgment of conviction.

Parties advised the Court will listen to statements by counsel, victim, a friend or relative of the defendant and defendant.  Any other statements must be in writing and provided to the Court 72 hours in advance of sentencing.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for July 22, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Mark S Rosen in court, defendant Cornelius Antoine Green not in court, in custody.  Laura A Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds
  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 19, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Status conference scheduled for April 25, 2014 at 08:30 am.

records.addlTxt:
Attorney Michael L. Chernin in court, defendant Cornelius Antoine Green not in court, in custody.  Laura A. Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds
  Plea hearing scheduled for April 11, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Cornelius Antoine Green in court with attorney Michael L. Chernin.  Defendant Cornelius Antoine Green in custody.  Megan Carmody for Laura A. Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Konkol, Branch 44. Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty.  Scheduling conference scheduled for March 26, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Cornelius Antoine Green not in court, defendant in custody.  Randy Sitzberger for Laura A Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant being sentenced today in Washington County. Attorney Chernin called the Court to reschedule the Preliminary Hearing.  Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for Preliminary Hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 7, 2014 at 08:30 am.

No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription taken in the manner and fashion as prescribed.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Cornelius Antoine Green in court with attorney Michael L Chernin.  Defendant Cornelius Antoine Green in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Konkol, Branch 44. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 21, 2014 at 08:30 am.
